svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-2" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" x="2045.5" y="226" width="344.5" height="684" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-5" value="import { CfnFunction } from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-lambda';" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2059" y="250" width="299.25" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-6" value="import * as cdk from 'aws-cdk-lib';" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2059" y="230" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-7" value="const app = new cdk.App();" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2059" y="300" width="159" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-8" value="const stack = new cdk.Stack(app);" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2059" y="321" width="189.75" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-9" value="new CfnFunction(stack, "MyLambda", {<div>&nbsp; &nbsp; handler: 'handler',</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; runtime: 'nodejs22.x',</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; role: lambdaRole.attrArn,</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; code: {</div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; zipFile: `</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span>exports.handler = async(args) =&gt; {<br></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; let response = {</span><br></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; statusCode: 200,</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; body: JSON.stringify("Hello From Lambda")</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; };</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; </span>return<span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp;response;<br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }</span><br></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">`</span><br></div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;}<br><div>});</div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2060" y="629" width="241" height="261" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-10" value="const lambdaRole = new CfnRole(stack, "LambdaRole", {<div>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;assumerolepolicydocument: {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Version: '2012-10-17',</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Statement: [</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Effect: 'Allow',</div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Principal: {</span><br></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Service: [</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'lambda.amazonaws.com'</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ]</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; },</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Action: [</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'sts.AssumeRole'</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ]</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ]</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><div>});</div></div>" <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-13" value="生成されるCloudFormationのテンプレート<div>(一部)</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2390.1800000000003" y="186" width="370" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-14" value="Resources:<div><br></div><div><br></div><div><br><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; LambdaRole:</span></div><div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Type: 'AWS::IAM::Role'</div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Properties:</span><br></div></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; AssumeRolePolicyDocument:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Version: '2012-10-17',</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Statement:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - Effect: 'Allow'</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - 'sts.AssumeRole'</span></div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2420" y="360" width="310.37" height="229" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6pQRIxlGVBGrCEECUlQn-15" value="<span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; MyLambda:</span><br><div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Type: 12.000001px;">'<br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Role: !GetAtt LambdaRole.Arn</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; exports.handler = async(args) =&gt; {</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; let response = {</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; statusCode: 200,</span><span };</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 267px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 251px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
生成されるCloudFormationのテンプレート
(一部)

switch.text: 生成されるCloudFormationのテンプレート...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 308px; height: 1px; padding-top: 355px; margin-left: 402px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Resources:
LambdaRole:
Type: 'AWS::IAM::Role'
Properties:
AssumeRolePolicyDocument:
Version: '2012-10-17',
Statement:
- Effect: 'Allow'
Principal:
Service:
- 'lambda.amazonaws.com'
Action:
- 'sts.AssumeRole'

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
